discourse_list.title: Quarterly Strategy Review - Q4 2021 - (Public Call on Friday, 3/11/22, 5:00PM UTC)

content.content: All, I am pleased to announce the first Quarterly Strategy Review (QSR) meeting, hosted by Strategic Finance in partnership with Growth, Risk, PE, and RWF. The purpose of the call is to review prior quarter results, and discuss MakerDAO’s Strategic Focus Areas, Key Performance Indicators, align on priorities, and collaborate on how to overcome any challenges the DAO is facing. The intent of this call is to be a dialogue between the Core Unit hosts and MKR holders, and we highly encourage participation. If you would like to join the conversation, please join the below zoom from 5 - 6:30PM UTC to discuss! https://us02web.zoom.us/j/83258300025?pwd=VGZnRWNIK25qTnd1R0lmbm1SMk1vZz09 Meeting ID: 832 5830 0025 Passcode: QSR001 @Core-Facilitators @Recognized-Delegates

Hello @Aes @SebVentures Looking forward to the call. Request for an updated Burn-Rate Estimate for the rest of 2022 based on the many budget requests that have been posted in the last 48 hours. Can you please provide a rough analysis based on 100% of the budgets request getting approved, 75%, 50% — is that possible? If not, no worries—totally understand that you have other tasks to tackle. I guess gauging oracles cost might also not help in providing the net-burn-rate…
